response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $12,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while supporting our commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
